title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and library for running LLMs locally with a simple API; supports Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and many others.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK that wraps the Ollama REST API for easy integration into Python apps.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers to chat with local Ollama models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you swap Ollama models into any LangChain chain or agent.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama with multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG uploads.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library exposing the full Ollama REST API with POJO models and streaming.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for interacting with Ollama from Rails or plain Ruby scripts.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced command-line wrapper adding REPL mode, prompt templates, and conversation history to the official binary.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot’s UI and shortcuts.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node affinity and PVC support.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated Modelfile collection (quantizations, system prompts, fine-tunes) for one-click import.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Repository of mini-projects: RAG with Chroma, function-calling, voice chat, Discord bot, etc.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal Flask/React desktop app for chatting with Ollama models packaged in Electron.

title: ollama discord bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers query local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI pipelines that spins up Ollama service containers and runs model tests.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Streamlit application demonstrating Retrieval-Augmented Generation with Ollama, ChromaDB, and PDF ingestion.

title: ollama-nest
summary: NestJS module that exposes Ollama as a provider with decorators for guards, interceptors, and Swagger docs.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate offering strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir library wrapping Ollama with GenServer behavior for fault-tolerant OTP apps.
